title: Surety Home Page
alertText: An alert is messaging that tells the user some information. Alerts can be error, warning, success, or info messages
quoteText: A block quotation (also known as a long quotation or extract) is a quotation in a written document, that is set off from the main text as a paragraph, or block of text, and typically distinguished visually using indentation and a different typeface or smaller size quotation.

disclaimerCopy.disclaimerText: We offer insurance by phone, online and through independent agents. Prices vary based on how you buy.
*National average annual car insurance savings by new customers surveyed who saved with Surety in 2017.

Surety Home Advantage® policies are placed through Surety Specialty Insurance Agency, Inc. with affiliated and third-party insurers who are solely responsible for claims, and pay PSIA commission for policies sold. Prices, coverages, privacy policies, and PSIA's commission vary among these insurers. How you buy (phone, online, mobile, or independent agent/broker) determines which insurers are available to you. A quote from one of the insurers can be provided through this site. Click here for a quote from other insurers or here for more information about PSIA's commission. Discounts not available in all states and situations.

caseStudyStoryHead.title: Services
caseStudyStoryHead.desc: Data, analytics and modeling Strategic mapping

caseStudyStoryDetail.title: The story
caseStudyStoryDetail.desc: The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society (LLS) wanted to help its local chapters expand their School & Youth Programs’ fundraising efforts. They asked Epsilon to develop an analytics-based targeting strategy to help the chapters identify high-potential schools and improve their marketing effectiveness.

caseStudySolution.csSolutionContent: Epsilon's Loyalty platform supports and routs data for each Balance Rewards member interaction, including online/in-store enrollments, online purchases and activity uploads from devices lnk FitBit. We also integrated Web services support real-time enrollment through multiple channels.

caseStudyResults.csResultsContent: more than 150 million people have enrolled in the Balance Rewards program. The system processes 4M+ purchase transactions per day and 4B+ loyalty requests per year.

testimonialBanner.testimonial: We were able to launch a [loyalty] program in a few short months... we wouldn't have been able to do it without Epsilon and the partnership we've built.
testimonialBanner.testimonialAuthor: Kelly Smolinksi, Director, Customer Systems, Walgreens

blogList.headingTxt: Why your data strategy and loyalty program do belong together
blogList.blogContent: One of the inherent benefits of loyalty programs is the data and insights marketers can glean about their best customers. Yet, as I talk with clients I often find marketers have the perception that their data strategy and loyalty programs do not belong together, and they are treated as separate marketing entities with unique teams, goals and plans.

blogList.headingTxt: Understanding the value of the catalog in the digital age
